subject: Beatrice here
body:
Do you have a tele phone and can return calls? Then dial the message line to hear how you can make money from your phone. In fact up to 3k each day.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-687-3704




Get back to me via Ledford6Ledford@compprime.com if not lnterested





If Bill Gates had a nickel for every time Windows crashed.... Oh wait! He does!
